content:
WsFederationConfiguration Class

Definition

Contains all of the configuration settings needed by the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFederationAuthenticationModule).

In this Article

public class WsFederationConfiguration
Inheritance
System.Object
WsFederationConfiguration

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

An instance of the WsFederationConfiguration class that is set on the FederationConfiguration object accessed through the FederationConfiguration property contains the settings that are used to initialize the properties of the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) and control its behavior. These settings are typically loaded from the <wsFederation> element in the configuration file.

Constructors

WsFederationConfiguration(WSFederationElement)

Initializes a new instance of the WsFederationConfiguration class from the specified <wsFederation> element.

public WsFederationConfiguration (System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WSFederationElement federationElement);
federationElement
WSFederationElement

The <wsFederation> element from which to initialize the new instance.

Remarks

The properties of the new instance are initialized according to the settings of the specified <wsFederation> element.

Some validation is performed on the WSFederationElement object specified by federationElement. Both the Issuer property and the Realm property must specify non-null, non-empty values. If the RequireHttps property is set true, the Issuer property must specify a URI that has an HTTPS scheme. The Freshness property cannot be negative. If any of these conditions are not met, an exception is thrown.

WsFederationConfiguration(String,String)

Initializes a new instance of the WsFederationConfiguration class by using the specified issuer and realm.

public WsFederationConfiguration (string issuer, string realm);
issuer
String

A string that contains the URI of the issuer to be used by the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM).

realm
String

A string that contains the URI of the requesting realm to be used by the WSFAM.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

issuer is null.

-or-

realm is null.

Remarks

The Issuer and Realm properties are initialized according to the issuer and realm parameters. All other properties are initialized to their default values.

Fields

DefaultFreshness

A constant that contains the default value for the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.Freshness* property; zero.

public const string DefaultFreshness = null;

DefaultMaxArrayLength

A constant that sets the default stem.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength* property of the XML dictionary reader quotas object referenced by the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas* property.

public const int DefaultMaxArrayLength = 2097152;

DefaultMaxStringContentLength

A constant that sets the default stem.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength* property of the XML dictionary reader quotas object referenced by the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas* property.

public const int DefaultMaxStringContentLength = 2097152;

DefaultPassiveRedirectEnabled

A constant that contains the default value for the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.PassiveRedirectEnabled* property; true, passive redirects are enabled.

public const bool DefaultPassiveRedirectEnabled;

DefaultPersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects

A constant that contains the default value for the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects* property; false, cookies are not enabled.

public const bool DefaultPersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects;

DefaultRequireHttps

A constant that contains the default value for the stem.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration.RequireHttps* property; true, HTTPS is required on redirects.

public const bool DefaultRequireHttps;

Properties

AuthenticationType

Gets or sets the value of the wauth parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string AuthenticationType { get; set; }
Value
String

A URI that specifies the authentication type. The default is an empty string.

CustomAttributes

Gets a dictionary that contains any extra attributes specified in the <wsFederation> element in the configuration file.

public System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,string> CustomAttributes { get; }
Value
Dictionary<String,String>

The dictionary that contains the extra attributes.

Freshness

Gets or sets the value of the wfresh parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Freshness { get; set; }
Value
String

The desired maximum age of authentication requests, in minutes. The default is DefaultFreshness.

HomeRealm

Gets or sets the value of the whr parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string HomeRealm { get; set; }
Value
String

The address of the home realm identity provider. The default is an empty string.

Issuer

Gets or sets a URI that identifies the intended issuer of the security token.

public string Issuer { get; set; }
Value
String

The URI that identifies the security token service (STS). Cannot be null.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

An attempt to set the property to null occurs.

PassiveRedirectEnabled

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the module is enabled to initiate WS-Federation protocol redirects.

public bool PassiveRedirectEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to enable redirects; otherwise, false. The default is DefaultPassiveRedirectEnabled, redirects are enabled.

PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a persistent session cookie is issued on successful authentication.

public bool PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to issue a persistent session cookie; otherwise, false. The default is DefaultPersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects, cookies are not enabled.

Policy

Gets or sets the value of the wp parameter to be used in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Policy { get; set; }
Value
String

A URL that identifies the policy to use. The default is an empty string.

Realm

Gets or sets the value of the wtrealm parameter to be used for WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Realm { get; set; }
Value
String

A URI that identifies the relying party (RP) to the security token service (STS). Cannot be null.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

An attempt to set the property to null occurs.

Reply

Gets or sets the value of the wreply parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Reply { get; set; }
Value
String

A URL that identifies the address at which the relying party (RP) application would like to receive replies from the Security Token Service (STS). The default is an empty string.

Request

Gets or sets the value of the wreq parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Request { get; set; }
Value
String

The token issuance request expressed as a <wst:RequestSecurityToken> element. The default is an empty string.

RequestPtr

Gets or sets the value of the wreqptr parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string RequestPtr { get; set; }
Value
String

A URL that specifies the location of the token issuance request expressed as a <wst:RequestSecurityToken> element

RequireHttps

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether communication with the security token service (STS) must use HTTPS protocol.

public bool RequireHttps { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if communication with the STS must be secured using HTTPS; otherwise, false. The default is DefaultRequireHttps, HTTPS is required.

Resource

Get or sets the value of the wres parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string Resource { get; set; }
Value
String

A URI that identifies the resource being accessed, the relying party (RP), to the to the security token service (STS). The default is an empty string.

Remarks

The wtrealm parameter, which is set by the Realm property, should be used instead of this parameter.

SignInQueryString

Gets or sets a query string that contains any additional parameters to be sent in WS-Federation sign-in requests (“wsignin1.0”).

public string SignInQueryString { get; set; }
Value
String

A URL fragment that contains the additional message parameters in the following format: “?param1=value1&param2=value2&paramN=valueN”. The default is an empty string.

SignOutQueryString

Gets or sets a query string that contains any additional parameters to be sent in WS-Federation sign-out requests (“wsignout1.0”) during passive sign-out.

public string SignOutQueryString { get; set; }
Value
String

A URL fragment that contains the additional message parameters in the following format: “?param1=value1&param2=value2&paramN=valueN”. The default is an empty string.

SignOutReply

Gets or sets the value of the wreply parameter to use during WS-Federation sign-out requests (“wsignout1.0”).

public string SignOutReply { get; set; }
Value
String

The URL to which the client should be redirected by the security token service (STS) during passive sign-out through the WS-Federation protocol. The default is an empty string.

XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas

Gets or sets the configurable quota values for XML dictionary readers used by this instance.

public System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas { get; set; }
Value
XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas

The object that contains the configurable quota values. The default object has the stem.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength* property set to DefaultMaxArrayLength and the stem.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength* property set to DefaultMaxStringContentLength.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

An attempt to set the property to null occurs.
